Description: 1996 Epiphone Les Paul Limited Edition Magenta Sparkle Electric Guitar w/Case Up for sale a 1996 Epiphone Les Paul Standard Limited Edition Magenta Sparkle Electric Guitar w/Case - #U6051302!  This instrument is a Used Model in Good Cosmetic Condition and in Perfect Playing Condition.  One this one, there is a finish crack/paint chip that has been repaired on the headstock (see 5th and 25th pictures) and there are several scratches, marks, dents (several large dents on the back body), notches, finish cracks, tiny paint chips, a light finish deterioration and other signs of wear here and there (see 13th to 25th pictures), but nothing major.  Unit comes in a Hardshell Case. - All pictures are in the "Item Description" section of the listing - 1996 EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD LIMITED EDITION This is a 1996 Epiphone Les Paul Limited Edition in Magenta Sparkle finish made in Korea. Slim-Taper, Fixed Neck with Rosewood Fingerboard for great feel and maximum playing speed without fatigue Carved Maple Top with Solid Wood Body for great sustain with warm lows and killer highs. Gibson Designed High-Output, Dual Chrome Humbucking Pickups for classic rock sound, vintage looks and lasting beauty Chrome-Plated Tune-o-matic Bridge and Stop-Bar Tailpiece for individual string intonation adjustment and superior sustain. SPECIFICATIONS: Pickups : 2 Humbuckers Hardware : Chrome  Scale / Nut width : 24.75" / 1.68"  Neck Joint : Set Fingerboard / Inlay : Rosewood / Trapezoid  Number of Frets : 22 Frets Binding : Body / Neck Body Wood : Alder Top  : Carved Maple Finish : Magenta Sparkle Weight : 8.6 lbs / 3.9 kg All our items are fully verified by our pro technician and/or adjusted by our pro luthier before being very carefully packed by our pro service team here at the shop prior to shipment, buy with confidence! --------------------------------------------------------------------- Canadian customers must pay any applicable sales taxes.
